title: The Loft
occurrences: - Where were you supposed to go? - To the loft. He told me to come to the loft.
Do you know the loft building at the corner of Second and South Hope, Mr. Seacord?
There's a loft on the ninth floor, Mr. Seacord. Have you ever been there?
Strange, because according to our information, you and four friends are sharing this loft
One of your loft buddies?
- Gentlemen! Welcome to the loft. - Wow, this is impressive, Vince!
- OK, so, this your loft? - No, it's ours... if you want it.
never got a text that's sayin' the loft was taken. Never..
There's a dead woman in our loft... that only us have access to.
Accepting a key to the loft, means you accept rules to the loft. Marty?
- Did you go, with this woman, to the loft? - What? No. This happened in San Diego.
I mean, you've got a key to the loft. What do you do up there? Laundry? Dishes?
It's a realtor, who wants to come up. Somebody's listed the loft for sale?
Listed the loft?
Wait... who the hell is trying to sell our loft?
It still doesn't explain why someone listed the loft!
Does your wife know you've been sharing a loft, with your pals?
I already told you, I'm not sharing a loft with any pals.
The loft is listed in her name. That's not a coincidence.
Wait a minute! You didn't tell Mimi about the loft?
What?! It's not about the Goddamn loft, Vince. It's about of my wife!
designed the new loft building, near the sports arena.
Come meet me in the loft, tomorrow, OK. We'll talk it through.
They found it. They found out. They found out about the Loft.
Put the hook in, so you'd wanna share the loft.
That's why we can never admit we're sharing this loft.
At his office? Look... for at least an hour, this morning, we were all in the loft.
I called the agency to ask who put our loft up for sale.
